resources.string:
Capture all Pokémon you can!!

With Pokedéx QR, you can:

1.Scan QR codes that represents each Pokémon.

2.Capture them all after scanning them.

3.See details of each Pokémon of first gen.

Instructions to generate your own QR codes:

1.Go to any \'QR code generator\' web page for example http://www.qr-code-generator.com.

2.Generate a QR code using this template "pokemon:id{Pokémon ID}" (Where Pokémon ID is the Pokémon ID!! without brackets).

3.Print it and scan it.

4.Have fun catching \'em all.

Check my Github for more information.
